headline: What Does Cummins' (CMI) Pause in Buybacks Reveal About Its Capital Allocation Priorities?
summary: Earlier this month, Cummins Inc. announced third quarter results showing sales of US$8.32 billion and net income of US$536 million, both down compared to the same period last year, alongside an update that it made no share repurchases during the quarter. One insight is that, although Cummins continued its previously announced buyback programs, it paused repurchases this quarter, coinciding with weaker earnings performance. We'll now examine how Cummins' lower quarterly net income impacts the...

headline: Plug Power Stock Is Off 20%. This Is Why.
summary: The wild ride for  Plug Power  investors continued.  Shares of the hydrogen technology provider plunged 20% in premarket trading to $1.71 after the company announced a capital raise on Tuesday evening.  Plug said it would offer $375 million of convertible notes, which can become more shares outstanding.

headline: Is Cummins Still a Bargain After 33.7% Rally and Alternative Power Moves?
summary: Wondering if Cummins could be solid value at today's price? You're not alone. There's a good reason smart investors are taking a closer look right now. After climbing an impressive 12.9% over the past month and gaining 33.7% year-to-date, Cummins has outperformed with a total return of 31.1% in the last year. Recent headlines spotlight Cummins' strategic moves in alternative power and emissions technology. These initiatives have kept the company in focus as investors consider shifts in...
